title: ME60079: Engineering Design Optimization - Quick Facts

Previous Year Grade Distribution

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Basic concepts: Unconstrained and constrained problems. The Kuln-Tucker conditions; Function of one variable; Polynomial approximations, Golden section method. Finding the bounds on the solution, a general strategy for minimizing functions of one variable; Unconstrained functions of n variables : Zero-order, first-order and second-order methods, convergence criteria; constrained functions of n variables: linear programming, Sequential unconstrained minimization techniques, Direct methods; Approximation techniques; Duality; General design applications.
